ai.grakn.graql.analytics

Interface ClusterQuery<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of result this query will return
    All Superinterfaces:
    ComputeQuery<T>, Query<T>

    public interface ClusterQuery<T>
extends ComputeQuery<T>
    Compute the connected components in the subgraph.
    Author:
    Jason Liu

    • Method Detail

      • members

        ClusterQuery<Map<String,Set<String>>> members()
        Return the instances in each cluster after executing the query. By default, the size of each cluster is returned after executing the query.
        Returns:
        a ClusterQuery with members flag set

        Returns:
